name: Attack In The Mushroom Kingdom
description:
As you know, by the old tales, biggest mushrooms grow only in the dark. It's a perfect time for the mushroom elves to build their new home.
However the evil forces don't asleep all the time. Ugly orcs want to chop it, cook it and eat it.
Help the cute little mushroom warriors in their trouble before sunrise.

Left Alt - Feed mushrooms with Water. Elves can't fight at this time. Also, it increases taking damage.
Right Alt - Rage mod. Decreases taking damage and increases power hit, but Elf will go into the portal after defeating all the orcs.
